SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Board
The Board class represents the Arimaa game board.
BoardMode
The BoardMode enum represents 5 possible modes of board interactivity.
Color
The Color enum represents the possible colors for a player's pieces.
CombinedGUI
The CombinedGUI class is the main frame class managing the entire user-program interaction, displaying and organizing several panels.
Direction
The Direction enum represents the four possible directions a piece can move in Arimaa.
Game
The Game class represents one Arimaa gameplay (with board and two players)
GameClock
The GameClock class facilitates tracking how much time each player spent in total and shows live information.
GameControlsPanel
The GameControlsPanel displays information about current turn and controls for individual moves while facilitating interaction between board, game, labeledboardpanel, and gamelistener.
GameListener
GameListener interface to communicate Game -> GameControlsPanel
HistoryPanel
The HistoryPanel facilitates reading game log and displaying it onto the board as user brows the game history by clicking previous/next move.
Move
The Move class represents a move in the Arimaa game.
Piece
The Piece record represents a single piece in the Arimaa game.
PieceType
The PieceType enum represents a piece type in the Arimaa game.
Player
The Player class represents a player in the Arimaa game.
Position
The Position record represents a position on the Arimaa game board.
PullMove
The PullMove class represents a pull move in the Arimaa game.
PushMove
The PushMove class represents a push move in the Arimaa game.
StepMove
This StepMove class represents a step move in the Arimaa game.
WelcomePanel
The WelcomePanel class represents a basic welcome panel with overview of the Arimaa rules.
